message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $130?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would you be open to selling the product for $135?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. However, I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $138.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I really value your flexibility. Could we possibly agree on $136 for the product?
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $139.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I think we're getting closer. Would you be willing to sell the product for $137?
I'm almost there, Bob! I'll make one more adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $140.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly agree on $138 for the product?
